-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, c1, c2))
-| wnfc(s2, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| diffsc(s2, c3)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

comment: Two ways to say that a function in maps-to notation is single-rooted. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Mar-2017.)
